body:
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  
  <script src="http://p5js.org/js/p5.min.js"></script> 

var fontHolder;


function preload(){
    fontHolder = loadFont("data/dataNexaRustHandmade.otf");

}

function setup(){
    createCanvas(800, 800);
    //textSize(52);
    textFont(fontHolder, 52);
 
}


function draw(){
   text("Creative Coding", width/2, height/2);
}

</script>
